ygData.subject: Re: The Summoning of Mayong Mistmoore
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Melanie s Mellifluous Motion song will only teleport you to locations you could normally walk to (thus preventing it s usefullness in de-trapping
ygData.messageBody:
At 02:54 PM 1/3/00 -1000, you wrote:
>From: "Reece, Tom - 25IDL G4" <g4mntofcr@...>
>
>If Mayong is in the zone but not reachable by normal methods due to pathing
>problems, is it possible that a solo bard who continues to use the 21st level
>teleport song could eventually teleport to the area where Mayong is at?

The Melanie's Mellifluous Motion song will only teleport you to locations
you could normally walk to (thus preventing it's usefullness in
"de-trapping" oneself from such lovely areas as that stupid door in one of
the dungeons and that locked house in Kithicor. I suspect this will
prevent it from being used in this manner. Sad, too.

Talies the Wanderer
